Milk Crown

When a droplet of milk falls into a thin layer of milk on a surface, a crown shape is formed after the impact! See Fig 1. Why this crown shape is formed? How do we get these spikes? These questions are still open and we do not have a sophisticated analytical description for them! I should tell you that this is a nonlinear problem!
